name: Second Hand Shooter - GMTK Game Jam 2020
name_original: Second Hand Shooter - GMTK Game Jam 2020
description:
Face off against an endless horde of invaders with the best ships on the black market. Just be warned, they weren’t cheap for no reason...

Secondhand Shooter is a classic arcade shoot-em-up that always keeps you on your toes. Each death re-rolls your controls, so it’s learn fast or die trying. Pick up powerups to keep pace against the alien’s growing strength, take out high-value golden ships, and try not to go out of control!
